cause.description:
Hatua Kwa Hatua is swahili for Step By Step. In this program, the ELCA's Western Iowa Synod participates in a partnership with a sister synod in Tanzania, that helps to bring necessities like food, clean water, education, etc. to the people of Tanzania through mission trips.
1. Scholarships are badly needed as the majority of the students of the Igumbilo Lutheran Girls Secondary School cannot afford the necessary tuition requirements.
2. Many more wells are needed. Approximate cost to drill one well is $2500.
cause.mission: enhance understanding of each other's ministries and cultures, share prayer for each other, as well as share faith journeys as you walk together Hatua Kwa Hatua/Step By Step.
cause.name: Hatua Kwa Hatua
